casebody.data:
Monday, March 13, 1995

MOTION DOCKET

94-419. Nos. 93AP-399 and 93AP-424. Royal Elec. Constr. Corp. v. Ohio State Univ. Franklin County,

This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for continuance of oral argument currently scheduled for April 18, 1995,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for continuance be, and hereby is, denied, effective March 9, 1995.
